DataElement.preferredName: Imaging Technique Observation Reuse Template Study Activity Repeat Frequency Code ISO21090.CD.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An activity defined at the global library level whose intention is to obtain pictures of the interior or exterior of the body usually for diagnostic reasons. EXAMPLE(S): X-ray, MRI A coded value specifying the number of occurrences of an activity within a given time period. EXAMPLE(S): BID = Two times per day, at unspecified times (does not necessarily imply that these are 12 hours apart); Q12H = Every twelve hours.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Imaging Technique Observation Reuse Template Study Activity Repeat Frequency Code
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any technology or method that aids in the visualization of any biological process, cell, tissue or organ for use in screening, diagnosis, surgical procedures or therapy.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:To use again.:Something that establishes or serves as a pattern for reference; a form, mold, or pattern used as a guide to making something.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective._Make or do or perform again.:The number of occurrences of something within a given time period.:A symbol or combination of symbols which is given an arbitrary meaning within a systematized collection of concepts used for data representation.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Imaging Technique Observation Reuse Template Study Activity

Concepts.definition: Any technology or method that aids in the visualization of any biological process, cell, tissue or organ for use in screening, diagnosis, surgical procedures or therapy.
Watching something and taking note of what happens.
Something that establishes or serves as a pattern for reference; a form, mold, or pattern used as a guide to making something.
A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.
An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions.

Property.preferredDefinition: Make or do or perform again.:The number of occurrences of something within a given time period.:A symbol or combination of symbols which is given an arbitrary meaning within a systematized collection of concepts used for data representation.

Concepts.definition: Make or do or perform again.
The number of occurrences of something within a given time period.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.
